extendedInfo.description: The Clone Phone appThis app is only available to 4GEE, Orange and T-Mobile pay monthly customers based in the UK.Customers on 4GEE plans can download the app straight away, but if youâre on an Orange or T-Mobile plan, please call customer services on 150 to subscribe to one of our Clone Phone plans before you start using the app.The Clone Phone app keeps a copy of your phone's content so you can quickly and simply get all your contacts, calendar, photos, music and videos back onto a replacement handset or your home computer.App Featuresâ¢	The Clone Phone app clones your content, so you have a snapshot of your contacts, calendar, photos, music and videos stored totally securely online. â¢	You can also use the Clone Phone website to view and download your content onto your home computer.â¢	With Clone Phone Loaded and Fully Loaded you can also locate your lost phone using Find-My-Phone on the Clone Phone website. And if you need to, lock and wipe it remotely so all your content doesnât fall into the wrong hands.Please note: Data charges apply when you download the app.Thank you for providing feedback â this update delivers various improvements. We'll keep listening so please stay in touch.Clone Phone InsuranceIf you want complete peace of mind you can sign up to Clone Phone Fully Loaded which combines the app with phone insurance.This means you can Get 24 hour replacement if your claim is accepted before 7.30pm or same day replacement if your claim is accepted by 11am*To purchase Clone Phone Fully Loaded, with insurance, or find out about all Clone Phone pricing, please call us on 150. See ee.co.uk/clone-phone for more information.*Geographical restrictions apply, excludes bank holidays and exceptional circumstances. Other terms apply, see www.ee.co.uk/terms for full details.

reviews.title: Worked
reviews.comment: Worked for me but now unable to back up new phone it just wants me to restore last phone clone which is done.
reviews.author: Karla Gregory

reviews.title: Poor Service
reviews.comment: I pay for a service that never clones all my stuff. Always an error. Will cancel, EE is not turning out that well for me...
reviews.author: Sara Ogden

reviews.title: Dont be so cheap!!
reviews.comment: An excellent service if you care about your phone. The best features are if you purchase EE Insurance wich in itself is an excellent product.
reviews.author: Kraig Davies

reviews.title: Very poor,
reviews.comment: I cannot log in as its booted me out and will not let me reset my password. Orange are also crap for not sorting this, I\'ve called them 4 times in total...
reviews.author: Sarah Khan

reviews.title: Never completes cloning!
reviews.comment: This app is very poor! Easy to start cloning  process but has not completed cloning of photos for months.Frustrating. Am tied into a contract with orange unfortunately - they are making money and providing a substandard service.
reviews.author: Ruth Greenhalgh

reviews.title: Hasn\'t worked once in months
reviews.comment: I try and use the app regularly but it never completes it\'s cycle. I don\'t see the point in having something that doesn\'t work, especially when we pay for it. Poor.
reviews.author: anthony peacock

reviews.title: Need to update
reviews.comment: Does not work on my galaxy s4 mini waiting for an update come on. Thats what EE have told me.
reviews.author: Gavin Plant

reviews.title: Never opens
reviews.comment: Always an error with it so unable to open for pay 2 weeks
reviews.author: Richard Micklewright

reviews.title: Useless!!
reviews.comment: Won\'t clone properly. Am stuck with this now and I can\'t back up all my data properly! Very unhappy!
reviews.author: Kate Bloomer

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t finish it\'s back up even using wifi that has 40MEG upload speed please fix
reviews.author: victor dhuphar

reviews.title: Just my opinion
reviews.comment: Cant restore my music video without wifi. Why can\'t I do it on my unlimited  internet on my mobile.
reviews.author: Nicola Stepniewska

reviews.title: Nice one
reviews.comment: Does exactly as it says on the tin
reviews.author: Stephen McGill

reviews.title: Rubbish as are instructions
reviews.comment: This app won\'t install on android HTC sensation to create account, and back up data, but it did work on the iPhone, pity I cannot now go back to android to get it to backup the essential data, we and orange tech services mwere useless in.dealing withmy migration issues too.
reviews.author: Martin Davies

reviews.title: A waste of storage space!
reviews.comment: AVG mobile antivirus has the same feature such as locking your phone, locate and remote wipe. As most phone us dropbox for photo back up and already stores contacts online there is no need for this app as you need to keep telling it to back up you phone.
reviews.author: Steve Townsend

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: I selected the things I wanted to clone but all its copied is my contacts
reviews.author: irfan iqbal

reviews.title: Good idea, doesn\'t work very well
reviews.comment: Great idea for backing up your phone, but often crashes and decides not to back it up.  I\'ve had it for 4 days now and still haven\'t managed to back up the videos
reviews.author: Daniel Baker

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works great on my Galaxy S, one issue but was resolved very quickly, easy option to buy more space if needed
reviews.author: Benjamin Wade

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Poor effort by a major UK carrier! Seriously is this as good as it gets from EE?  I\'ll bet the iPhone app works just fine though...If i could give zero stars I would have!
reviews.author: Rob Alford

reviews.title: Wish I could give lower than 1
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work always says \"there\'s a problem at our end, come back in a few hours\"  not good.
reviews.author: james stephens

reviews.title: Irritating notifications
reviews.comment: Once I have opted for automatic cloning you don\'t have to notify me every now and then about the phone being cloned... also there is no setting to opt out the notifications.
reviews.author: Prashant Kesarkar
